TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class SoapFormatter Implements IFormatter, IRemotingFormatter
type SoapFormatter = class interface IRemotingFormatter interface IFormatter

summary.span: 以 SOAP 格式序列化和還原序列化物件，或連接之物件的整個圖形。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in SOAP format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個類別已經過時。Beginning with the .NET Framework 2.0, this class is obsolete. 請改用 。Use instead. 和類別會實作介面，以支援遠端程序呼叫 (Rpc)，而介面 (由繼承) 若要支援序列化的物件圖形。The and classes implement the interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the interface (inherited by the ) to support serialization of a graph of objects. 類別也支援使用 Rpc物件，而不使用功能。The class also supports RPCs with objects, without using the functionality. Rpc 的期間介面可讓兩個不同的物件圖形的規格： 要序列化的物件圖形和包含的標頭 （適用於遠端函式呼叫的相關資訊的物件陣列的其他圖形例如，交易識別碼或方法簽章）。During RPCs, the interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature). 進行適當的序列化，第一個圖形的根物件必須實作的物件介面或介面。For proper serialization, the root object of the first graph must be an object that implements either the interface or the interface. 在 RPC，還原序列化期間來指定委派格式器的方法。During deserialization of an RPC, a delegate is specified to the method of the formatter. 遠端執行功能基礎結構使用產生支援的物件，委派介面。The remoting infrastructure uses the delegate to produce an object that supports the interface. 此物件包含標頭，儲存的資訊，而會變成圖形還原序列化程式所傳回的根。This object contains the information stored in the headers, and becomes the root of the graph returned by the deserializer. 也可以處理與實作的物件所產生的 Rpc介面。The can also handle RPCs that are produced with objects that implement the interface. 若要建立使用 RPC，而不使用功能，支援的物件位置根目錄中的圖形，正在序列化的介面。To create an RPC without using the functionality, place an object that supports the interface at the root of a graph being serialized. 若要還原序列化此方式建立 RPC屬性必須設定為支援的另一個物件介面，並包含相關的遠端呼叫資訊。To deserialize an RPC created in this manner the property must be set to another object that supports the interface, and contains the relevant remote call information. ## TimeSpan 序列化TimeSpan Serialization TimeSpan 物件都會序列化根據 ISO 8601: 1998年區段 5.5.3.2.1 「 替代 」 標準。TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard. ## 版本資訊Version Information 不支援序列化的.NET framework 版本之間的相容性。The does not support serialization compatibility between versions of the .NET Framework. 序列化通常 framework 1.1 和 2.0 版類型之間就會失敗。Serialization between versions 1.1 and 2.0 types in the Framework often fails. 若要解決此問題，可以執行下列動作：The following actions can be taken to remedy this issue: - 若要使用的轉換，這樣會提供 1.1 和 2.0 之間的相容性。Convert to use the , which provides compatibility between 1.1 and 2.0. - 將現有的保存的資料轉換成新格式。Convert existing persisted data to the new format. - 將所有的生產者和取用者的序列化資料轉換成 2.0 版中。Convert all producers and consumers of serialized data to version 2.0. - 避免使用從 1.1 變更為 2.0 的型別。Avoid using types that changed from 1.1 to 2.0. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CPP/soapformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CS/soapformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/VB/soapformatter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`| ||新初始化為指定的序列化的資料可以傳輸至或接收從任何其他內容A new initialized to specify that the serialized data can be transmitted to or received from any of the other contexts| ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CPP/soapformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CS/soapformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/VB/soapformatter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件，序列化或還原序列化從，指定。Objects are serialized to, or deserialized from, the specified . 在序列化或還原序列化程序使用指定搜尋想要還原序列化的物件類型與您已註冊的 surrogate。The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize. 代理是 helper 的序列化和還原序列化特定類別的物件。Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes. 預設值無法處理從衍生的物件序列化進行遠端處理。The default cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the for remoting purposes. 在遠端處理的情況下指定取代物件衍生自與序列化時所指定的代理選取器的物件。In a remoting situation the specified replaces the object derived from with a object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector. 因此，如果您想要使用遠端物件時，設定`selector`參數的執行個體。Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of . 如果您不需要 (instance)，設定`selector`參數必須為`null`。If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供列舉，描述來源和目的地指定的序列化資料流，以及保留該內容和其他呼叫端定義的內容序列化的方式。The provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.

summary.span: 將資料流還原序列化至物件圖形。

span.span: Deserializes a stream into an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

param.name: serializationStream
param.span: 資料流，包含要還原序列化的資料。

span.span: The stream that contains the data to deserialize.

summary.span: 還原序列化在提供的資料流上的資料，並重新組合物件 Graph。

span.span: Deserializes the data on the provided stream and reconstitutes the graph of objects.

returns.span: 還原序列化圖形的最上層物件 (根)。

span.span: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功的還原序列化資料流中目前的位置必須是物件圖形的開頭。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CPP/soapformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/CS/soapformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFormatter Example/VB/soapformatter.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

abstract member Deserialize : System.IO.Stream * System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler -> obj override this.Deserialize : System.IO.Stream * System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler -> obj

summary.span: 將資料流還原序列化至物件圖形中，使用指定的 處理該資料流中的任何標頭。

span.span: Deserializes the stream into an object graph with any headers in that stream being handled by the given .

returns.span: 還原序列化圖形的最上層物件 (根)。

span.span: The top object of the deserialized graph (root).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標頭只能用於特定的遠端處理應用程式。Headers are used only for specific remoting applications. 參數是下列其中一種從 SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) 格式的資料流中傳回標頭。The parameter is one of two ways to return headers from a stream in SOAP Remote Procedure Call (RPC) format. 另一種方式是使用屬性。The other way is to use the property. 成功的還原序列化資料流中目前的位置必須是物件圖形的開頭。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. ## TimeSpan 序列化TimeSpan Serialization TimeSpan 物件都會序列化根據 ISO 8601: 1998年區段 5.5.3.2.1 「 替代 」 標準。TimeSpan objects are serialized according to the ISO 8601: 1998 section 5.5.3.2.1 "Alternative" standard. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 支援搜尋，且它的長度為 0。

span.span: supports seeking, and its length is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的值為和（預設值）。Supported values are and (the default). 如需有關還原序列化層級的詳細資訊，請參閱[自動還原序列化.NET 遠端處理中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用於 SOAP 遠端程序呼叫 (RPC) 格式，並指定 SOAP 上方的記錄不是通用語言執行階段物件類型的遠端呼叫的方法。This property is used for SOAP remote procedure call (RPC) format and specifies that the SOAP top record is a method called remotely, not a common language runtime object type.
